description: Damien Crosse is an intelligence officer who will do anything, or anyone, to complete his mission. To gather the information he needs on Theo Ford, Damien poses as an IT technician and goes to Theo’s home. Damien can’t help himself at the sight of Theo’s lover, Flex. Damien fucks Flex’s tight muscle ass until the two exchange warm cum shots to each other’s face.
title: Another Life Part 1
